explains: vt. 给…定基调；说明基本政策
wordGroup: keynote speech 会上发表的主要讲话；政党代表大会上关于施政方针的演说
keynote address n. 政治性集会中的政策演讲
keynote speaker 主讲人；大会发言人；主讲嘉宾

sentences.en: The keynote of his speech was unity.
Today the keynote of the wedding gown is simplicity.
sentences.cn: 如今结婚礼服的基调是素雅。

sentences.en: Choice is the keynote of the new education policy.
sentences.cn: 新教育政策的主导原则是容许选择。
